page.title: 11LONGHOPE:THE LATCHEN ROOM
page.content: built in 1906 on Latchen Hill it is the community centre for the village. Its upkeep is provided from the fete (see previous page). It has a large range of activities covering every age group, from {Mothers and {Toddlers }to {Playgroup.}There is a { {Youth Club}for the over 10s. Then there is an Amateur Dramatic Club,{the {Lads} and many other activities from {W.I. to Gardening Club. Sports Clubs meet at the hall or the Recreation Ground and there is the{Evergreens } for the over 60s. With family discos once a month ,there really is something for everyone.
